item.title: Hello world, goodbye gallbladder
item.description: Hello, friendly visitor. Welcome to what I hope one day will become a large collection of small ramblings on different aspects of life. I find myself having a bit of a strange drive to begin this blog today. Tomorrow, I’m to be stripped of a lifelong companion. Yes, as you may have gathered from the title, I’m getting my gallbladder removed. Even though I trust that the little sucker tried its best for the past 31 years, it just doesn’t quite cut it anymore.
